name: Marmite Yeast Extract Medium
description: Marmite on toast is a unique & delicious breakfast, which helps make your mornings that little bit better! Marmite is a kitchen cupboard essential. Marmite yeast extract spreads easily on toast, providing a quick & simple breakfast solution for the whole family to enjoy. What’s more, Marmite is rich in B vitamins and has no added sugar - what more could you want from a breakfast?! Spread Marmite on toast, crumpets, bagels and a host of other foods. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
